cases.title: User login with valid credentials
cases.description: User can login with valid credentials
cases.preconditions: Ensure the application is accessible and the login page is available.
cases.postconditions: Ensure that the application remains in a stable state after successful login.

steps.action: User Open Login Page at Gojek
Enter a valid username into the username field.
Enter the corresponding valid password into the password field.

steps.expected_result:
1. User Succsessfully login into dashborad page.
2. Appeared allert message 'success'

cases.title: User login with blank password
cases.description: User can't login with blank password

steps.action: User Open Login Page at Gojek
Enter a valid username into the username field

steps.expected_result:
1. Error mesage appeared that password must be fill in.
2. User failed to login

cases.title: User booking ride service with valid inputs
cases.description: User can booking ride service with valid inputs
cases.preconditions: Ensure the application is accessible and the user is logged in with valid credentials.
cases.postconditions: Ensure that the application remains in a stable state after confirming the service selection.

steps.action: Open the service section at dashboard page
Choose a ride type or delivery service

1. Input delivery location
2. Input destination address

steps.expected_result:
1. User succsessfully booking a ride
2. Appeared information detail about provide options

cases.title: User booking ride service with blank details
cases.description: User can't booking ride service with blank details
cases.preconditions: Ensure the application is accessible and the user is logged in with valid credentials.
cases.postconditions: Ensure that the application remains in a stable state after confirming the service selection.

steps.action: Open the service section on dashboard page
Click specific service option from the list

cases.title: Payment with valid inputs
cases.description: User can Payment with valid inputs
cases.preconditions: Have access to the online transportation platform with a selection of available payment methods
cases.postconditions: Ensure that the application remains in a stable state after updating payment settings.

cases.title: Payment with blank details
cases.description: User can't Payment with blank details
cases.preconditions: Have access to the online transportation platform with a selection of available payment methods
cases.postconditions: Ensure that the application remains in a stable state after updating payment settings.
